pkgmetadata.longdescription: # python-ssdbThe python client for [SSDB](https://github.com/ideawu/ssdb) Key-Value store.## Installation```shell$ pip install python-ssdb```## Features- Use compiled response parser written in Cython.- Supports connection pool.- Supports async API.## Usage### Basic example```python>>> from ssdb import SSDB>>> cli = SSDB(host="localhost", port=7036)>>> cli.set("foo", "bar")1>>> cli.get("foo")b'bar'```## Commands- Supports all commands in [this page](https://ssdb.io/docs/php/) ## LicenseThis software is licensed under the [Apache 2 license](LICENSE), quoted below.Copyright 2023 Kakao Corp. <http://www.kakaocorp.com>Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may notuse this project except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copyof the License at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, softwaredistributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUTWARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See theLicense for the specific language governing permissions and limitations underthe License.
